title: Challenges and Preparedness Improvement Project for Emergency Distance Education (EDE)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic teaching skills and experience in guiding science curricula
context.additional_context: A Course to Strengthen Science Subject Remote Teaching Capabilities in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technological Environments for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers. Emphasizes Problem-Solving and Solution Development Through Collaborative Learning

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify technical and pedagogical challenges that arise during emergency remote education transitions
Learners can design and implement solutions to bridge ICT accessibility gaps for teachers and students
Learners can develop blended asynchronous/synchronous remote instruction models tailored to science curricula

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
